documents.document: Not for the faint-hearted. There was no room on the floor to open suitcases, or to store them flat. The shower was literally over the toilet because the bathroom was so small. The rooms upstairs were clean and quiet, but we had horror stories from other guests about conditions lower down - holes in doors and so much noise all night that sleep was impossible. Breakfast was an experience to be missed. We were told by taxi drivers that this a leading love hotel where rooms are let for short term assignations. Taxis are not allowed to stop outside during the day as there is a bus stop there, so beware if it is raining.
